bibl.title: 'When Egypt Divorced Itself': Ptolemaic Tarache and the Elpis of Harchonesis
Studies on Ancient Egypt in Honour of H.S. Smith
bibl.author: THOMPSON, Dorothy J.

bibl.note: The Harchonesis of U.P.Z. I, 13 is in fact the native leader of the Egyptian revolt (170-168 B.C.) mentioned in P. Köln IV, 186.
THOMPSON Dorothy J., 'When Egypt Divorced Itself': Ptolemaic Tarache and the Elpis of Harchonesis.
Anthony LEAHY and John TAIT (Edd.), Studies on Ancient Egypt in Honour of H.S. Smith = Occasional Publications. 13 (London, 1999) pp. 322-326.
